Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory11.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's the last two!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "What's the situation, Lucia?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "My arm, it's not responding.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Looks like it's completely broken.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I only did some temporary repairs earlier so of course, it's going to break if you use it like that...", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Though I'm the one to talk.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "... (Looks at his gun's smoking barrel)", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, survivor found!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'You finally... came...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You've already been corrupted by the Punishing Virus, but fortunately, it still hasn't exceeded the tolerance limit of your Inver-Device.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Please allow me to access your M.I.N.D., I can help lessen your burden from fighting with the virus.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Thank you... I never thought I'd live to see such an advanced Support-type Construct...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'If only they were able to hold on a bit longer...', 4: '2'}
{1: '100', 2: 'Did you see a white-haired Construct?', 3: '62', 4: '(Ask about the attack.)', 5: '63'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Sorry, but we haven't encountered the Construct you asked about...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "We're a supply team that got forced to retreat onto this bridge by the Corrupted and made this temporary communication station as a last resort.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'The amount of Corrupted and threat levels here exceeded our calculations... They broke through our guard rather quickly...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "We've never seen anything like that before... I can say for sure that the Corrupted have formed an organization...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Corrupted should only be able to follow the kill order of the Punishing Virus...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please elaborate on what you mean by having formed an organization.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Did you notice those graffiti nearby?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'We found that these graffiti will draw in the mechanoid Corrupted, and only they can understand its true meaning.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "We tried to decipher the messages, but mechanoids with human consciousness like us can't understand it at all...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Be careful of those graffiti... They are gathering the Corrupted...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is this a new behavior of the Corrupted due to the control of the Punishing Virus?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm afraid not, the Corrupted's only goal is to destroy humans and everything that has human consciousness.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But they don't need to communicate with each other, or maybe this is a result of something else other than the Punishing Virus.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you for your information and contribution.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Please recall now. We will notify the Purifying Force to retrieve your frames.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Oh, one more thing...', 4: '2'}
